#summary Getting Started Page

= Introduction =

This page will try to describe the different ways of getting started with this project.


= Details =

* If you want simply to use the software, please go to [UseSoftware]

* If you want to use this software as a library for other software you're writing, please go to [UseLibrary]

* If you want to modify or extend this software, please checkout the code via SVN and let me know if you want to submit a patch or need assistance!
